name: Hungry Ridgewolf

flavor_text: Even vampires know to travel faster when they hear howling in the Geier Reach passes.

name: Immolation
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/-2.
flavor_text: Nothing is funnier to a devil than setting someone—anyone—on fire.

name: Jack-o'-Lantern
oracle_text:
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Jack-o'-Lantern: Exile up to one target card from a graveyard. Draw a card.
{1}, Exile Jack-o'-Lantern from your graveyard: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text: By the end of the festival, it was the only thing still grinning.

name: Kessig Flamebreather
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Kessig Flamebreather deals 1 damage to each opponent.
flavor_text: "Hunter's fire" was meant for slaying monsters in the Ulvenwald, but that never stopped Ralen from showing it off.

card_faces.name: Kindly Ancestor
card_faces.oracle_text:
Lifelink
Disturb {1}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard transformed for its disturb cost.)
card_faces.flavor_text: "You look cold, dearie."

card_faces.name: Ancestor's Embrace
card_faces.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has lifelink.
If Ancestor's Embrace would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.
card_faces.flavor_text: "Thank you, Grandmother. I love you too."

name: Lacerate Flesh
oracle_text: Lacerate Flesh deals 4 damage to target creature. Create a number of Blood tokens equal to the amount of excess damage dealt to that creature this way. (They're artifacts with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

name: Lambholt Harrier
oracle_text: {3}{R}: Target creature can't block this turn.
flavor_text:
"This Tovolar is no brainless brute. He sends his howling minions to terrorize a village for months. Sleepless nights and fear take their toll. Only then, when morale is at its worst, does he strike."
—Barnes, village watch

card_faces.name: Lantern Bearer
card_faces.oracle_text:
Flying
Disturb {2}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard transformed for its disturb cost.)
card_faces.flavor_text: Val didn't know what the silent geist was offering . . .

card_faces.name: Lanterns' Lift
card_faces.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has flying.
If Lanterns' Lift would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.
card_faces.flavor_text: . . . but she knew it would be rude to refuse.

name: Larder Zombie
oracle_text:
Defender
Tap three untapped creatures you control: Surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)
flavor_text: The cathars arrived at the abandoned lab to find many of the unfinished projects gnawing on one another.

name: Lightning Wolf
oracle_text: {1}{R}: Lightning Wolf gains first strike until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor_text: These thick-furred wolves have adapted to Stensia's storms, channeling their energy into bursts of supernatural speed.

name: Locked in the Cemetery
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Locked in the Cemetery enters the battlefield, if there are five or more cards in your graveyard, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
flavor_text: "Help! I'm not a zombie! Let me out!"

name: Lunarch Veteran // Luminous Phantom
type_line: Creature — Human Cleric // Creature — Spirit Cleric

card_faces.name: Lunarch Veteran
card_faces.oracle_text:
Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.
Disturb {1}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard transformed for its disturb cost.)
card_faces.flavor_text: "Even in our darkest times, Avacyn's light still guides us."

card_faces.name: Luminous Phantom
card_faces.oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever another creature you control leaves the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
If Luminous Phantom would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.

name: Massive Might
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Run! It's coming for us! Eventually!"
—Yaster, Havengul shopkeeper

name: Might of the Old Ways
oracle_text:
Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
Coven — Then if you control three or more creatures with different powers, draw a card.
flavor_text: Brimming with power from their disrupted ritual, the Dawnhart witches lashed out at the werewolf intruders.

name: Militia Rallier
oracle_text:
Militia Rallier can't attack alone.
Whenever Militia Rallier attacks, untap target creature.
flavor_text: "We can wait like helpless children for a hero, or we can gather our courage and *be* the heroes. Who's with me?"

name: Mindleech Ghoul
oracle_text:
Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
When Mindleech Ghoul exploits a creature, each opponent exiles a card from their hand.
flavor_text:
"This still doesn't make you the brains of the operation."
—Ghoulcaller Gisa

name: Moldgraf Millipede
oracle_text: When Moldgraf Millipede enters the battlefield, mill three cards, then put a +1/+1 counter on Moldgraf Millipede for each creature card in your graveyard. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)
flavor_text: Between stitchers, cultists, and scavengers, corpses are in high demand.

name: Moonrager's Slash
oracle_text:
This spell costs {2} less to cast if it's night.
Moonrager's Slash deals 3 damage to any target.
flavor_text: The cathars fell like leaves as Tovolar himself joined the fray.

name: Morkrut Behemoth
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or pay {1}{B}.
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor_text:
"Let's see my brother's stitched-up little toys compete with this."
—Ghoulcaller Gisa

name: Mounted Dreadknight
oracle_text:
Trample
Mounted Dreadknight enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if an opponent lost life this turn.
flavor_text: Markov vampires cultivate an image of such decadent elegance that it can be easy to forget they can field a deadly fighting force.

name: Mourning Patrol // Morning Apparition
type_line: Creature — Human Soldier // Creature — Spirit Soldier

card_faces.name: Mourning Patrol
card_faces.oracle_text:
Vigilance
Disturb {3}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard transformed for its disturb cost.)
card_faces.flavor_text: "It's creepy out here, isn't it, boy? I always feel like someone's watching us."

card_faces.name: Morning Apparition
card_faces.oracle_text:
Flying, vigilance
If Morning Apparition would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.
card_faces.flavor_text: "You could see the spirits all along, couldn't you? Well, now I can too."

name: Mulch
oracle_text: Reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all land cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
flavor_text:
"Tread carefully. You remember what happened in the last quiet, peaceful clearing."
—Halana, to Alena

name: Nature's Embrace
oracle_text:
Enchant creature or land
As long as enchanted permanent is a creature, it gets +2/+2.
As long as enchanted permanent is a land, it has "{T}: Add two mana of any one color."

name: Nebelgast Beguiler
oracle_text: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
flavor_text: A moment of distraction, an hour off course.

name: Neonate's Rush
oracle_text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast if you control a Vampire.
Neonate's Rush deals 1 damage to target creature and 1 damage to its controller. Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"We spend our entire existence pursuing the joy of our first night's feast."
—Anje Falkenrath

name: Novice Occultist
oracle_text: When Novice Occultist dies, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
flavor_text: All across Gavony, in shuttered bedrooms and locked barns, young people seek the answers their elders failed to provide.

name: No Way Out
oracle_text: Target opponent discards two cards. You create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed. (It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)
flavor_text: In the maze-like passages of the Erdwal, a wrong turn can be fatal.

name: Nurturing Presence
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn."
When Nurturing Presence enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

name: Olivia's Midnight Ambush
oracle_text: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. If it's night, that creature gets -13/-13 until end of turn instead.
flavor_text: "And you were almost finished with that ritual, weren't you, darling? How very rude of me. To make it up to you, I'll send you an invitation to my wedding."

name: Organ Hoarder
oracle_text: When Organ Hoarder enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library, then put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
flavor_text: The stitcher died years ago, but her dutiful assistant still keeps the laboratory well stocked.

name: Otherworldly Gaze
oracle_text:
Surveil 3. (Look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)
Flashback {1}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

name: Pack's Betrayal
oracle_text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. If you control a Wolf or Werewolf, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
flavor_text: Tovolar's howl of command was too much to resist, even for Arlinn's own loyal pack.

name: Parish-Blade Trainee
oracle_text:
Training (Whenever this creature attacks with another creature with greater power, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)
When Parish-Blade Trainee dies, put its counters on target creature you control.
flavor_text: The recruits trained in eternal night, fueled by the hope that they might one day see the sun again.

name: Path to the Festival
oracle_text:
Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. Then if there are three or more basic land types among lands you control, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
Flashback {4}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

name: Persistent Specimen
oracle_text: {2}{B}: Return Persistent Specimen from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
flavor_text:
"The jaw bone's connected to the skull bone. The skull bone's connected to the . . . uh . . . hook thingy."
—Garl, sticher's assistant

name: Pestilent Wolf
oracle_text: {2}{G}: Pestilent Wolf gains deathtouch until end of turn.
flavor_text: Wolves that feast on zombie flesh and survive carry the foul diseases of the dead wherever they roam.

name: Piercing Light
oracle_text: Piercing Light deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor_text:
"Creatures of the night dissolve like shadows in the light of faith."
—Thalia, Guardian of Thraben

name: Plummet
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with flying.
flavor_text:
"A creature of stone was never meant to fly. And I see the Ulvenwald agrees with me."
—Halana, Kessig ranger

name: Pointed Discussion
oracle_text: You draw two cards, lose 2 life, then create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
flavor_text: Small talk is a dying art.

name: Pyre Spawn
oracle_text: When Pyre Spawn dies, it deals 3 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Memories of the Harvesttide tragedy festered until they grew into an incarnate rage that set the world ablaze.

name: Ragged Recluse // Odious Witch
type_line: Creature — Human Peasant // Creature — Human Warlock

card_faces.name: Ragged Recluse
card_faces.oracle_text: At the beginning of your end step, if you discarded a card this turn, transform Ragged Recluse.
card_faces.flavor_text: "Forgive my manners. It's been so long since I had a guest for dinner."

card_faces.name: Odious Witch
card_faces.oracle_text: Whenever Odious Witch attacks, defending player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
card_faces.flavor_text: Her cauldron refilled, she settled in to wait for the next unsuspecting traveler to knock at her door.

name: Raze the Effigy
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target artifact.
• Target attacking creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The folk of Kessig build up their courage by burning effigies of the things they fear.

name: Reckless Impulse
oracle_text: Exile the top two cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.
flavor_text: A stitcher looks at their creation and sees the result of years of study and hours of toil. A devil sees a new plaything.

name: Repository Skaab
oracle_text:
Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
When Repository Skaab exploits a creature, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Created to capture the spark of genius for later use.

name: Return to Nature
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target artifact.
• Destroy target enchantment.
• Exile target card from a graveyard.
flavor_text:
"Even steel and stone return to Ghrin-Danu in time."
—Katilda, Dawnhart Prime

name: Revenge of the Drowned
oracle_text: Target creature's owner puts it on the top or bottom of their library. You create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed. (It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)
flavor_text: A heavy net doesn't always mean a good catch.

name: Ritual Guardian
oracle_text: Coven — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control three or more creatures with different powers, Ritual Guardian gains lifelink until end of turn.
flavor_text: "By ancient magics, by angels' grace, we will survive this night."

name: Rotten Reunion
oracle_text:
Exile up to one target card from a graveyard. Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed. (It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)
Flashback {1}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
flavor_text: Aunt and Uncle Greyfield loved dinner guests.

name: Rot-Tide Gargantua
oracle_text:
Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
When Rot-Tide Gargantua exploits a creature, each opponent sacrifices a creature.
flavor_text: Now that it doesn't need to breathe, its hunting ground extends well beyond the sea.

name: Rural Recruit
oracle_text:
Training (Whenever this creature attacks with another creature with greater power, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)
When Rural Recruit enters the battlefield, create a 3/1 green Boar creature token.
flavor_text: The Dawnhart survivors welcome recruits of all shapes and sizes.

name: Sanctify
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. You gain 3 life.
flavor_text:
"Olivia Voldaren has faith only in herself. We answer to a higher calling."
—Thalia, Guardian of Thraben

name: Scattered Thoughts
oracle_text: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put two of those cards into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
flavor_text: Stitchers delegate the most important tasks to assistants with a good eye for detail.

name: Search Party Captain
oracle_text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature you attacked with this turn.
When Search Party Captain enters the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor_text: "Werewolves leave messy trails. Easy to follow. Hard to forget."

name: Secrets of the Key
oracle_text:
Investigate. If this spell was cast from a graveyard, investigate twice instead. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
Flashback {3}{U}
flavor_text: As Sigarda and Sorin battled, Arlinn and Teferi recovered the key from the Markov catacombs.

name: Selhoff Entomber
oracle_text: {T}, Discard a creature card: Draw a card.
flavor_text: It knows one fundamental truth: bodies belong in graves.

name: Serpentine Ambush
oracle_text: Until end of turn, target creature becomes a blue Serpent with base power and toughness 5/5.
flavor_text: The merchant did guarantee the new bait would bring in something big.

name: Shadowbeast Sighting
oracle_text:
Create a 4/4 green Beast creature token.
Flashback {6}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
flavor_text:
"Werewolves leave tracks. Vampires leave wrung-out corpses. This is something else."
—Paulin, trapper of Somberwald

card_faces.name: Shady Traveler
card_faces.oracle_text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Daybound (If a player casts no spells during their own turn, it becomes night next turn.)
card_faces.flavor_text: The stranger spoke to no one, and the townspeople gladly returned the favor.

card_faces.name: Stalking Predator
card_faces.oracle_text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Nightbound (If a player casts at least two spells during their own turn, it becomes day next turn.)
card_faces.flavor_text: Tomorrow a new village, and new victims.

name: Sheltering Boughs
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Sheltering Boughs enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+3.
flavor_text:
"We're not at odds with the woods. How could we be, when we share so many enemies?"
—Marel, Dawnhart witch

name: Shipwreck Sifters
oracle_text:
When Shipwreck Sifters enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card.
Whenever you discard a Spirit card or a card with disturb, put a +1/+1 counter on Shipwreck Sifters.
flavor_text: A loyal crew sticks together, even after death.

name: Siege Zombie
oracle_text: Tap three untapped creatures you control: Each opponent loses 1 life.
flavor_text: A barricade only buys time. So the wealthy buy more barricades.

name: Sigarda's Imprisonment
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
{4}{W}: Exile enchanted creature. Create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

name: Silver Bolt
oracle_text: {3}, {T}, Sacrifice Silver Bolt: It deals 3 damage to target creature. If a Werewolf is dealt damage this way, destroy it.
flavor_text:
"When a werewolf charges, you'll only have time for one shot. Best make it count."
—Captain Eberheart

name: Skywarp Skaab
oracle_text:
Flying
When Skywarp Skaab enters the battlefield, you may exile two creature cards from your graveyard. If you do, draw a card.
flavor_text:
"If I wanted all the parts to match, I wouldn't have become a stitcher."
—Barton, stitcher

name: Snarling Wolf
oracle_text: {1}{G}: Snarling Wolf gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.
flavor_text:
"Oh, thank the angels. It's not a werewolf, just a regular wo—"
—Bruno, Ulvenwald guide, last words

name: Soul-Guide Gryff
oracle_text:
Flying
When Soul-Guide Gryff enters the battlefield, exile up to one target card from a graveyard.
flavor_text: It conducts the souls of the righteous to their blessed rest and the spirits of the evil to justice.

name: Sporeback Wolf
oracle_text: As long as it's your turn, Sporeback Wolf gets +0/+2.
flavor_text: The mushrooms growing in the wolves' fur possess curative properties incredible enough to tempt many alchemists into risking their lives to track one down.

name: Spore Crawler
oracle_text: When Spore Crawler dies, draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Remember to come back in a few years when that fungus has died off. Then we'll see what's in the chest."
—Old Rutstein

name: Startle
oracle_text:
Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn. Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed. (It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)
Draw a card.

name: Steelclad Spirit
oracle_text:
Defender
Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, Steelclad Spirit can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.
flavor_text: Some geists imitate the lives they left behind. Others follow the dreams they never realized.

name: Stitched Assistant
oracle_text:
Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
When Stitched Assistant exploits a creature, scry 1, then draw a card. (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library, then you may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

name: Stolen Vitality
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+1 until end of turn. If it's your turn, that creature gains trample until end of turn. Otherwise, it gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor_text: "There's nothing like a good meal to really lift the spirit."

name: Stormrider Spirit
oracle_text:
Flash
Flying
flavor_text: The weary travelers mistook the flickering lights for a candleguilde pointing the way to Harvesttide. Their relief turned to terror as lightning lit the sky.

name: Stuffed Bear
oracle_text: {2}: Stuffed Bear becomes a 4/4 green Bear artifact creature until end of turn.
flavor_text: It takes a taxidermist of unusual skill to cleanly stuff and mount a beast without severing its primal, predatory drive.

name: Sungold Barrage
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with toughness 4 or greater.
flavor_text: Heida allowed herself a moment of satisfaction as she watched the beast fall, then turned to seek another foe. It would be a long, long night.

name: Supernatural Rescue
oracle_text:
This spell has flash as long as you control a Spirit.
When you cast this spell, tap up to two target creatures you don't control.
Enchant creature you control
Enchanted creature gets +1/+2.

name: Sure Strike
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor_text: Before the officiant even had a chance to ask if anyone objected to the Voldaren-Markov union, Arlinn made her opinion known.

name: Syncopate
oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.
flavor_text: "Fool! Can't you see the tide has turned against you?"

name: Syphon Essence
oracle_text: Counter target creature or planeswalker spell. Create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
flavor_text: The third step in creating a skaab requires draining the body of blood and replacing it with *viscus vitae*, a mixture of angel's blood and lamp oil.

name: Tapping at the Window
oracle_text:
Look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.
Flashback {2}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

name: Tavern Ruffian // Tavern Smasher
type_line: Creature — Human Warrior Werewolf // Creature — Werewolf

card_faces.name: Tavern Ruffian
card_faces.oracle_text: Daybound (If a player casts no spells during their own turn, it becomes night next turn.)
card_faces.flavor_text: She dispatched every challenger with a sickening snap of bone.

card_faces.name: Tavern Smasher
card_faces.oracle_text: Nightbound (If a player casts at least two spells during their own turn, it becomes day next turn.)
card_faces.flavor_text: With every arm in sight broken, she turned her attention to the furniture.

all_parts.name: Tavern Ruffian // Tavern Smasher
all_parts.type_line: Creature — Human Warrior Werewolf // Creature — Werewolf

name: Thraben Exorcism
oracle_text: Exile target Spirit, creature with disturb, or enchantment.
flavor_text: Chandra, Teferi, and Arlinn sought clues to the Moonsilver Key's whereabouts while Kaya dispatched the spirits obstructing their path.

name: Timberland Guide
oracle_text: When Timberland Guide enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
flavor_text: Hiring an experienced wilderness guide isn't cheap, but it costs less than a search party. Or a funeral.

card_faces.name: Tireless Hauler
card_faces.oracle_text:
Vigilance
Daybound (If a player casts no spells during their own turn, it becomes night next turn.)
card_faces.flavor_text: The new hire proved more than enough to replace the three farmhands who disappeared the week before.

card_faces.name: Dire-Strain Brawler
card_faces.oracle_text:
Vigilance
Nightbound (If a player casts at least two spells during their own turn, it becomes day next turn.)
card_faces.flavor_text: A few townsfolk had their suspicions, but none dared accuse him openly.

name: Toxic Scorpion
oracle_text:
Deathtouch
When Toxic Scorpion enters the battlefield, another target creature you control gains deathtouch until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"You want that venom? Collect it yourself! I'm not losing another pair of dragonhide gloves."
—Old Rutstein

name: Traveling Minister
oracle_text: {T}: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn. You gain 1 life. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor_text: Priests of the Sigardian Sect travel to the farthest reaches to spread hope and healing, even in the darkest times.

name: Unblinking Observer
oracle_text: {T}: Add {U}. Spend this mana only to pay a disturb cost or cast an instant or sorcery spell.
flavor_text:
"Day 77: The homunculus within the crystal continues to mimic my every movement. I wonder what they are writing?"
—Laboratory notes of Yzlkpk

name: Undying Malice
oracle_text: Until end of turn, target creature gains "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it."
flavor_text: Few take kindly to being put in their place, especially if their place is the grave.

name: Unhallowed Phalanx
oracle_text: Unhallowed Phalanx enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor_text:
"In case any of you new recruits were wondering, this is why we don't use mass graves anymore."
—Kerren of the Mausoleum Guards

name: Unholy Officiant
oracle_text:
Vigilance
{4}{W}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Unholy Officiant.
flavor_text:
"Is this twisted ceremony simply a mockery of the human rite, or has Olivia fallen for her own charade?"
—Sorin Markov

name: Unruly Mob
oracle_text: Whenever another creature you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Unruly Mob.
flavor_text: "We survived the Travails! Killer angels! Horrors from beyond the moon! Now some big werewolves think they can scare us? Let 'em try."

name: Vampire Interloper
oracle_text:
Flying
Vampire Interloper can't block.
flavor_text: The Voldaren have begun demanding blood offerings from the villagers in their territory. Their agents arrive from the sky to collect the ceremonial bowls in eerie silence.

name: Vampire's Kiss
oracle_text: Target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life. Create two Blood tokens. (They're artifacts with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
flavor_text: Young vampires gorge themselves at every meal, but their elders have learned to savor the smallest bite.

name: Vampire Slayer
oracle_text: Whenever Vampire Slayer deals damage to a Vampire, destroy that creature.
flavor_text: When Kaya saved her village, Berit realized even vampires could be killed. When she brought one down herself, she realized she had found her calling.

name: Voldaren Epicure
oracle_text: When Voldaren Epicure enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to each opponent. Create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
flavor_text: "If you're not refining your tastes, what's the point of living forever?"

name: Voldaren Stinger
oracle_text:
Voldaren Stinger has first strike as long as it's attacking.
{2}{R}: Voldaren Stinger gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: A duel to first blood means something very different when a vampire is involved.

name: Wanderlight Spirit
oracle_text:
Flying
Wanderlight Spirit can block only creatures with flying.
flavor_text: The towers and catwalks of the Voldaren fortress are lit by the lanterns of geists endlessly seeking a way out.

card_faces.name: Weary Prisoner
card_faces.oracle_text:
Defender
Daybound (If a player casts no spells during their own turn, it becomes night next turn.)
card_faces.flavor_text: "Your guard attacked me. He got what was coming to him."

card_faces.name: Wrathful Jailbreaker
card_faces.oracle_text:
Wrathful Jailbreaker attacks each combat if able.
Nightbound (If a player casts at least two spells during their own turn, it becomes day next turn.)
card_faces.flavor_text: "And now I'm coming for you!"

card_faces.name: Weaver of Blossoms
card_faces.oracle_text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
Daybound (If a player casts no spells during their own turn, it becomes night next turn.)
card_faces.flavor_text: Living in harmony with nature . . .

card_faces.name: Blossom-Clad Werewolf
card_faces.oracle_text:
{T}: Add two mana of any one color.
Nightbound (If a player casts at least two spells during their own turn, it becomes day next turn.)
card_faces.flavor_text: . . . does not always mean living in peace.

name: Wedding Invitation
oracle_text:
When Wedding Invitation enters the battlefield, draw a card.
{T}, Sacrifice Wedding Invitation: Target creature can't be blocked this turn. If it's a Vampire, it also gains lifelink until end of turn.
flavor_text: RSVP at your own risk.

name: Witch's Web
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains reach until end of turn. Untap it.
flavor_text: Ever since the ritual, Ryla didn't have an appetite at the dinner table, but her long walks in the forest always seemed to satiate her hunger.

name: Wolf Strike
oracle_text: Target creature you control gets +2/+0 until end of turn if it's night. Then it deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.
flavor_text: Tovolar's howlpack had scattered, but the Dire-Strain survivors were still on the hunt.

name: Wretched Throng
oracle_text: When Wretched Throng dies, you may search your library for a card named Wretched Throng, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text:
"Oh no. Oh no. Oh no. Oh no, again!"
—Beltstad, cathar recruit, last words
